phrases: You did a fine job, Kanaloa.
Now rest for the time being.
We cannot beat him like that!
Gate of the Goat, I open thee!
I can nullify all forms of magic.
That is no different than when we were in Edolas!
I scrap with Gray all year'round, so I am used to it!
In my dream, even Titania confessed her love for me...
He even cancelled my ability to fly.
I told you I nullify everything.
Do you listen when someone is talking to you?
If we cannot use magic, we cannot do anything!
There has to be some way!
How are you going to attack?
I just thought of something awesome!
When we first split up, Gildarts was using magic, right?!
Then if I beat him without magic,
it will be like I beat Gildarts!
For better or worse, you are positive, Natsu.
Even though I told you that the fate of the world is at stake,
all you care about is winning or losing for yourself...
The weight that we bear on our shoulders is different from yours.
We are prepared to throw away our lives for the sake of our duty.
We are back to that again?
He is our enemy, but he is got guts.
The real fight is just about to start.
Anyway, I am just lookin' forward to a totally hot battle with you doing your best.
You just need to rest a while.
It has something to do with the magic spell I was under, does not it?
No matter how hard I try, I cannot remember any of the time when I was a snake.
Would I be able to stay here?
You were turned into a snake?!
Although I do not remember anything from then...
I just remember one thing, that my friend made me a promise.
That even if we were separated,
he would ride a shooting star to come and get me someday.
She is the snake that was hanging around before.
The snake showed signs of being put under a curse...
And when you lifted the curse, it was really a girl, huh?
Except it was a powerful spell, and I could not detect its purpose...
Even now, her condition is unstable.
Which is why I took her in, so we can keep an eye on her...
A voice that only she can hear...
With apologies to Kinana, when her memories of being a snake do return,
it may not be something to celebrate.
So her memories may prove poisonous, huh?
Well, we will all watch over her, will not we?
You have got nothing to worry about now!
Because no matter what happens, we will protect you.
So just hush up and get some rest.
Prepared to throw your lives away for some duty, ya say?
Lives are not meant to be tossed away like garbage!
We are fightin' because of a friend.
And'because of our bond, we can overcome anything.
Friends are not some tools that you use!
And they are not something you can just throw away!
How many hits has he taken?
Those eyes do not look anywhere close to giving in.
Do not even think of gettin' in on this...
I am takin' this guy down.
As a Fairy Tail wizard, I swear I will take him...
At last, he cannot even stand...
Even so, Natsu will not look down.
I am sure... he will look ahead!
Even though he is the enemy, kudos to him!
When I look at you, a feeling long forgotten comes to the fore.
Even though you seem to speak sense,
in the end, you people are guild wizards.
You lot take on jobs for the money,
so for you to mock our noble mission...
Who does it for the money?!
I did not think he would hit the nail on the head...
In the first place, you bastards are the ones who stole from Lucy...
Even without the Infinity Clock in operation,
chaos is already loose in this world.
Zentopia teaches us to display proper behavior even as we monitor the chaos.
Turning that path into action is the duty of Legion.
He is suddenly full of energy...
They are all over the place.
You ate the sacred flames of the crypt?!
I thought you were going to keep preachin', Octo-man.
Although that kind of talk just goes in one ear and out the other...
All that stuck is friend and lives.
And now I am going to pay you back 100-fold for insulting the guild!
Even though he does not need to go to the trouble of making him angry...
The end is in our hands!
The end is in our hands!
The end is in our hands!
You speak of foolishness such as replacing the archbishop.
Realize that we are facing a much bigger problem.
There is a traitor within Zentopia.
spills information about the Infinity Clock...
The attacks on the provincial diocese...
I have heard it was abetted by someone on the inside.
Do I have a reason to lie?
I am suspicious of the priest who survived the attack that time.
I would like to question him directly.
I will look after the archbishop.
From now, no one shall enter his bedchamber.
If you make magic by eating fire, I can nullify that, too.
Byro-sama has never used attacking magic?
Coco, I think you already know this,
is among the five strongest in all of Fiore.
The weak have no right to control this world.
We are not doing anything wrong.
People cannot survive without something to rely on.
It is only natural to depend on it.
Therefore, if His Grace tells us to search for the clock, we will look until we find it!
And if being scrupulous about the methods means not being able to find it,
Neither do I, but you are definitely wrong!
Have not you thought about all the people who are going to suffer because of your mission?!
It is foolish to act upon your emotions.
To provide the correct path and to follow the correct path,
we are forced to make hard choices!
The world is always full of contradictions.
I have the sense to know that at least.
Therefore, it is natural that at the end of the path I choose, there will be sacrifices.
The cryptex in my head got all scrambled.
But it must be easy for you.
You do not decide by emotions, but by following your because, right?
If it does not prick your conscience,
anyone could easily make those choices, right?
Sorry, but could you explain what everyone is talking about,
Do you contest the whole concept of a rightful because?
What kind of rightful because makes people sad and suffer?!
In Edolas, we saw a lot of people suffering
A path that forces you to cause people pain and sacrifice them along the way
is one that will eventually fall to pieces and disappear!
Is that the way you want everyone to go?!
Even a fish is free to swim wherever it wants in the water, right?!
We take requests from people who are in trouble and help them,
so they can be happy and we get a reward.
That is how we have been operating all along.
That is what a guild does!
Against you and that fake righteousness you hold over your head,
Tail is not going to be beat!
No, your ridicule of Zentopia knows no bounds!
Our guild is not built on logic.
We act to protect our honor.
And for that you shall receive Heaven's punishment!
Not if I can help it!
If he uses that against people...
Burn in the flames of your own sins... and be purified!
The path of righteousness for Legion... for all Zentopia...
Is not the righteous path the one where we guide the powerless lambs?!
Going down the path that sacrifices people...
I can no longer accept that contradiction!
Would you turn your back on the faith?!
I know what my fate will be for betraying Legion.
But I cannot see what lies at the end of our righteous path anymore!
It pierces everything, leading to the truth in a straight line!
I know you have not forgotten that precept!
If that arrow sacrifices many powerless lambs along the way,
Our doctrine is not everything to me.
Watching what these people do touched me...
They are so nice and look like they have so much fun...
I am sure you will feel it too, Byro-sama.
If you face these people with your heart...
I will not even wait for the hearing!
You will be judged right here, Coco!
Last time, we did not have a chance to cross swords,
but we finally meet, Byro Cracy.
Aiming an attack at your comrade in a fit of rage...
Hey, you do not bully the weak!
I had a hunch there was trouble, so we hustled on over here...
And look what we have got.
The real fight was just about to start and then you waltz in!
You all found the parts of the clock!
Carla's team found a part, too!
There is the one we found!
we have obtained all five parts.
All that is left is the clock hand you people stole from Lucy.
And you will give it back.
If you want it, come and get it, Titania.
You stand against all of us?
We are going to seal away all the parts of the clock and keep them safe.
So just give that to me without protest.
The Infinity Clock originally belonged to Zentopia.
We are bound to take charge of it.
This is the first I have heard...
You are all in too deep.
You peered at the darkness that must not be seen.
Already, I cannot allow you to leave here alive!
So this is what that guy was talking about!
Magic does not work on him!
Who knew he was this strong?
For sure, this is a pain in the ass...
Now it is like I am just a normal cat!
No matter how many of you attack at once, it makes no difference.
Against me, wizards are no longer wizards.
Then there is nothing for it...
We will just have to beat the crap out of you with our bare hands.
Even in a physical fight, I am trained to take on 50 people at once.
So you are fired up too, huh, Octo-man?
He is a master of the fighting arts.
That is what I was hoping for.
Time was etched, and then chaos descended.
Is this... the beginning of the end?
It is ringing in my head!
My head feels like it is splitting in half!
They are closing in at the foot of the slope!
We cannot open the gate yet!
I can hear it... the eternal midnight...
Let us not just stand around!
That one guy is not here!
The one with the squarish face.
Oh, the one that goes, ...yes, right?
But you did not sound like him one bit.
Next time: The New Oracion Seis Appears!
I sound just like him, yes.
